attributes.action: Stop the Proposed 6th Terminal at Heathrow Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age of global warming, expanding this airport so that it can take up to 800,000 flights (from 450,000) a year is just plain madness

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
